snippet: An American diet company is trying to convince the French that portion-controlled boeuf bourguignon is not just another assault on their culture.
abstract: American diet company Jenny Craig is attempting to attract French consumers to its weight-loss program, and faces an uphill battle trying to convince a country proud of its cuisine to embrace its regimen of individually portioned, packaged foods; the company sees an opening because the French are increasingly worried about the obesity rate in their country.
lead_paragraph: An American diet company is trying to convince the French that portion-controlled boeuf bourguignon is not just another assault on their culture.

headline.main: French Women Worry About Getting Fat, Too
headline.print_headline: French Women Worry About Getting Fat, Too
